name: Keep IT Alive (uelen)
description:
(NOTE: Web version only works on chrome)

It’s your first week as a full-time employee at OGREL. Will you manage to survive the backstabbing and treachery of the office environment? Will you impress you boss? Will you manage to keep your career alive?

Keep IT Alive is a beigepunk IT simulator. Try to survive for as long as possible in a corporate IT environment. Read emails and try to impress corporate. Will you fly or fall?

For extra ambience put on
